answer:
The answer is A

The second president was Thomas Jefferson.

Thomas Jefferson was born in 1743 and was the third vice president as well as the third secretary of state. He was the third and fifth president of the Continental Congress and the third president of the Confederation. He was the third president of the Biographical directory of the Confederation and the rectangular seal of the Confederation.
